beginner.title: Basic Greetings
beginner.description: Learn how to greet people and introduce yourself

dialogue: A: Hello! My name is Sarah. What's your name?
B: Hi Sarah! I'm Miguel. Nice to meet you!
A: Nice to meet you too, Miguel!

beginner.title: Asking for Directions
beginner.description: Learn how to ask for and give basic directions

dialogue: A: Excuse me, where is the nearest restaurant?
B: Go straight for two blocks, then turn left.

intermediate.title: Making Plans
intermediate.description: Practice discussing future plans and schedules

dialogue: A: What are you doing this weekend?
B: I'm thinking about going to the movies. Would you like to come?
A: That sounds great! What time should we meet?

advanced.title: Expressing Opinions
advanced.description: Learn to express and defend your opinions in discussions

dialogue: A: What do you think about the new environmental policies?
B: In my opinion, they're a step in the right direction, but more needs to be done.
A: I agree to some extent, however, I think the implementation might be challenging.
